nodes.bodyText: I think the ! (not) is wrong here. When a system is in maintenance mode, we can run remote commands.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -133,8 +135,10 @@ public void onMessage(Session session, String messageBody) {
             int timeOut = 600; // 10 minutes
 
             if (msg.isPreview()) {
+
                 List<String> allVisibleMinions = MinionServerFactory
                         .lookupVisibleToUser(webSession.getUser())
+                        .filter(m -> !mm.isSystemInMaintenanceMode(m))

nodes.bodyText: Agreed, we discussed offline and I think Martin is about to fix it.
